subject: Greetings!
body:
Greetings!
My name is Omran Abdullah, I work as Head of Communications at Alba Nova investments LLC, our investors are seeking for new
business opportunities and projects for possible funding and
capital financing. We are open to further discussions.
Yours Sincerely,
Omran Abdullah
Head Of Communication Alba Nova Investment LLC.
PO Box 3235, Level 3, Tower C-1,
Street 32, Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates.

subject: Re: Greetings!
body:
Hello Omran Abdullah,

It's a pleasure to meet you. I'm intrigued by your proposal of seeking new businesses and projects for possible funding and capital financing. Could you please provide more details about the kind of projects or businesses your investors are interested in? Also, what is the usual range of investment that Alba Nova LLC typically makes?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Gregory

subject: Re: Greetings!
body:
Dear Gregory,


Thank you for your email, based on its content, kindly note the following:


1. We are ready to consider possible collaboration with projects between
the limits of US$1M to US$5Billion. We are ready to fund projects within
any sector and geographical area as long as we find the project as
presented viable after our review. Our offer for funding is based on a debt
finance of 2.5% interest rate annually which is not limited to any sector
or region.


2. All projects are considered for funding independently and the specific
terms and conditions for granting funding also differ from one project to
the other because projects differ in structure and capital requirements for
its actualization. The specific term for granting funding for a specific
project can only be finalized after our review and consideration based on
the offering of the project.


3. For the purpose of consideration of projects for funding purposes, we
will also expect the project presentation, executive summary and
comprehensive business plan to support the project. If after our initial
review we accept to fund the project, we will issue the project owner a
formal loan application form which will be filled. All the sections of the
application form are meant to collect all data and information necessary
for considering the loan request.


4. The 2.5% interest rate on the loan is constant throughout the duration
of the loan. The duration of the loan is only agreed and determined based
on the structure of the project and the duration as requested by the
project owner at the time of making the loan application to ANI.


5. Currently our offer for funding is only based on loan/debt finance.
However, as part of the funding application process, an evaluation is
rendered by an independent financial consultant who makes a recommendation
to the project owner on the funding scheme which is most workable between
the project owner and ANI. If at this stage the consultant recommends an
equity stake, we will definitely consider the same, but before then our
offer is based on the loan as offered.


6. The funding application process takes within 2â€“ 4 weeks to be finalized
depending on the timely actions and implementations between both parties.
The summary of the process includes three important steps


- Initial review: As soon as we are in receipt of the comprehensive
business plan and project presentation, we will forward the same for an
initial review. This initial review is executed internally by our team. If
after this initial review is confirmed that this project will be funded,
the project owner will be issued with the loan application form. This loan
application form is only issued to project owners whose project has been
reviewed and confirmed to receive funding from ANI.


- Evaluation/Due diligence process: The completely filled loan application
form as received from the project owner is attached to all project details
and data as received which is forwarded to a private financial consultant.
This consultant acts independently and will render a final evaluation and
due diligence. This consultant will discuss with the project owner on all
best funding options for this project and make a final recommendation to
ANI. At the completion of the same, the consultant will also issue to the
project owner a draft copy of the funding contractual agreement which will
define all the terms and conditions for granting the funding in
clear/precise terms. If this term as stipulated is acceptable to the
project owner, ANI will proceed with the finalization and implementation
process.


- The finalization and implementation process involves a face-to-face
meeting between ANI's facilitators and the representatives of the project
owner to familiarize and discuss the project, terms and the collaboration.
After signing all MOU, we will proceed with the actual implementation which
involves fund disbursement to the project owner's designated account.


We hope this communication clarifies and guides you accordingly. We will
look forward to further communication from you in moving forward.


Kind regards,


Omran Abdullah.
Director of Corporate Communication
Alba Nova Investment Corporation of Abu Dhabi
PO Box 3235, Level 3, Tower C-1, Street 32, Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates.
Tel: +971 2 444 4012
Email: info@albanovainvestments.com

subject: Re: Greetings!
body:
Hello Omran Abdullah,

Thank you for your detailed response. It's great to hear that you're open to funding projects in any sector and region, as long as they are viable. I'm particularly interested in the debt finance option with a constant interest rate throughout the loan duration.

Could you please elaborate more on the evaluation process? Specifically, what criteria does your financial consultant use to determine whether a project is viable or not? 

Also, could you provide more information about the due diligence process? What kind of information will be required from me during this stage?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Gregory

subject: Re: Greetings!
body:
Hello Omran Abdullah,

Thank you for your detailed response. It's great to hear that you're open to funding projects in any sector or region, and I appreciate the clarity on your loan debt finance offer.

I'm curious about the review process. Could you please elaborate more on what criteria your team uses during the initial review of a project? What makes a project viable in your eyes?

Also, could you provide more information about the role of the financial consultant? How are they chosen and what is their relationship with ANI?

Lastly, I'd like to understand better about the signing and disbursement process. Is there a specific location where this meeting takes place or can it be done virtually?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Gregory

subject: Re: Greetings!
body:
Dear Gregory,

I am in good receipt of your email and as such i want you to know that
projects are been evaluated by their sizes and region and also our due
diligence can be done electronically since we will need the borrower to set
up an SPV account here in the UAE before the loan can be approved by the
central bank of the UAE.

So I will have you fill out our KYC form then we can take it from there.
Regards,

Omran.

subject: Re: Greetings!
body:
Hello Omran,

Thank you for your prompt response. It's interesting to learn about the process of evaluating projects based on their sizes and regions. I'm also intrigued by the concept of setting up an SPV account in the UAE.

Could you please elaborate more on what an SPV account is? And how does it contribute to the loan approval process by the central bank of the UAE?

Also, I'd appreciate if you could explain a bit more about this KYC form that I need to fill out. What kind of information does it require?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Gregory

subject: Re: Greetings!
body:
Dear Gregory,

Did you receive my previous email?

Please advise.
Regards,

Omran.
